name: Coffee House
description: A social gathering place serving coffee and conversation; adventurers can meet informants, discuss politics, or overhear the latest news and rumors.
atmosphere: The air is rich with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and the subtle scent of tobacco. The sound of animated conversation and the clink of cups creates a lively, intellectual atmosphere. Patrons engage in passionate debates while the air crackles with the exchange of ideas and information.
